column2: "Jesus kaa iyinom no
column3: ɔnye n'esuafo no puei kotwaa ɔwora Kidron
column5: na ɔnye n'esuafo no kɔr mu."

column2: "Na Judas so a oriyi no ama no so nyim hɔ
column3: osiandɛ Jesus nye n'esuafo no tɔɔ dɛ wokehyia hɔ."

column2: "Na Judas faa asafo no nye asomfo a wofi asɔfompanyin nye Farisiifo no nkyɛn no
column3: ɔbaa hɔ
column4: wokitsakitsa nkandzea nye atsɛn nye akodze."

column2: "Na Jesus nyim dza ɔreba no do nyina no
column3: opuei kebisaa hɔn dɛ

column2: "Wobuaa no dɛ
column3: Jesus Nazarɛtnyi no a. Jesus buaa hɔn dɛ
column4: Emi nye no.  Nna Judas a oriyi no ama no so nye hɔn gyina hɔ."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Emi nye no no
column4: wɔdze hɔn ekyir hɔn ekyir kɔhwee daadze."

column2: "Na obisaa hɔn bio dɛ
column3: Hom rohwehwɛ woana?  Na wɔsee dɛ

column2: "Jesus buaa dɛ
column3: Mekaa kyerɛɛ hom dɛ emi nye no; dɛm ntsi sɛ emi na hom rohwehwɛ me a

column2: "ama asɛm no a ɔkaa dɛ
column3: Hɔn a edze hɔn ama me no mannyew mu biara no

column2: "Na Simon Peter a nna ɔdze afona no twee
column3: na ɔdze bɔɔ ɔsɔfopanyin no n'akowaa
column4: na otwaa n'asowa nyimfa; na akowaa no ne dzin dze Malkus."

column2: "Na Jesus see Peter dɛ
column3: Fa nkrantsee no hyɛ bɔha no mu: kɔɔpow a m'Egya dze ama me no

column2: "Na asafo no nye safohen no ɔnye Jewfo asomfo no faa Jesus na wɔkyekyeer no
column4: "na wɔdze no dzii kan kɔr Annas nkyɛn
column5: osiandɛ Kaiafas a odzi afe no mu sɔfopanyin no n'asew nye no."

column2: "Na Kaiafas nye nyia ɔmaa Jewfo no apam dɛ oye dɛ nyimpa baako bowu ama ɔman no no."
"Na Simon Peter nye osuanyi baako dzii Jesus ekyir
column3: na ɔsɔfopanyin no nyim osuanyi no
column4: na ɔnye Jesus kɛhɛɛn ɔsɔfopanyin aban mu hɔ."

column2: "Na Peter dze
column3: ogyinaa abow no ano guado. Na osuanyi no a ɔsɔfopanyin no nyim no no puei bɛkasaa kyerɛɛ abowanohwɛfo no na ɔdze Peter baa dan mu."

column2: "Na abaawa abowanohwɛfo no see Peter dɛ
column3: Ana wo so immfi nyimpa yi n'esuafo no mu? Peter see dɛ

column2: "Na nkowaa no nye asomfo no gyinagyina hɔ a wɔdze biriw abɔ gya
column3: osiandɛ awɔw aba
column4: na wɔroto gya; nna Peter so gyina hɔ roto gya."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfopanyin no bisaa Jesus n'esuafo nye ne nkyerɛkyerɛ ho asɛm."
"Jesus buaa no dɛ
column3: Makasa petee akyerɛ wiadze; daa mekyerɛkyerɛ wɔ nhyiamudan nye asɔrfi mu

column2: "Emi dze
column3: ɔyɛ dɛn na ibisa me? Bisa hɔn a wɔtsee asɛm kor a mekaa kyerɛɛ hɔn: hwɛ

column2: "Na ɔkasaa dɛm no
column3: asomfo a wogyina hɔ no mu baako bɔɔ Jesus sotɔr see no dɛ

column2: "Jesus buaa no dɛ
column3: Sɛ maka bɔn a

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Annas somaa no nkyehoma mu kɔr Kaiafas ɔsɔfopanyin no hɔ."
"Nna Simon Peter gyina hɔ roto gya. Na wɔsee no dɛ
column3: Ana ɔwo so immfi n'esuafo no mu? Ɔsanee na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Ɔsɔfopanyin no no nkowaa mu baako a ɔyɛ nyia Peter twaa n'asowa no no busuanyi no see no dɛ
column3: Ana mennhu wo wɔ ne nkyɛn wɔ ture no mu?"

column2: "Na Peter saan bio; na ntsɛmara akokɔ bɔnee."
"Na wɔdze Jesus fii Kaiafas nkyɛn kɔr ambrado aban mu; nna ahanamakye a
column3: na hɔnara dze wɔannhɛn ambrado aban mu hɔ
column4: amma hɔn ho eenngu fi na woeedzi apaho (edziban) no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Pilate puei baa hɔn nkyɛn na obisaa dɛ
column3: Ebɛn sombo na hom dze bɔ dɛm nyimpa yi?"

column2: "Wobuaa no dɛ
column3: Sɛ oyi nnyɛ ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi a

column2: "Na Pilate see hɔn dɛ
column3: Homara hom mfa no
column4: na hom nkobu no atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hom mbra tse. Jewfo no see no dɛ
column6: yennyi ho kwan dɛ yeku obiara;"

column2: "ma Jesus n'asɛm a ɔkae dze kyerɛɛ owu kor a orubowu no aaba mu."
"Na Pilate hɛɛn ambrado aban mu bio
column3: na ɔfrɛɛ Jesus na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Ana ɔwo nye Jewfo hen no?"

column2: "Jesus buaa no dɛ
column3: Wankasa reka yi
column4: anaa binom kaa no mo ho kyerɛɛ wo?"

column2: "Pilate buaa dɛ
column3: Ana emi meyɛ Jewnyi a? Wankasa wo mamfoo nye asɔfompanyin no na wɔdze wo brɛɛ me. Ebɛnadze na eyɛe?"

column2: "Jesus buaa dɛ
column3: M'ahendzi mmfi wiadze yi mu: sɛ m'ahendzi fi wiadze yi mu a
column5: amma wɔaammfa me annhyɛ Jewfo nsa; na afei m'ahendzi mmfi ha."

column2: "Pilate see no dɛ
column3: Nna eyɛ ɔhen nye no? Jesus buaa dɛ
column4: Ɔwoara aka dɛ meyɛ ɔhen: iyi ntsi na wɔwoo me
column6: ama maabɛgye nokwar no ho dase. Obiara a ofi nokwar no mu no

column2: "Pilate see no dɛ
column3: Nokwar nye ebɛnadze? Na ɔsee dɛm no
column4: opuei kɔr Jewfo no hɔ bio
column7: munnhu afɔdzi biara wɔ no mu."

column2: "Na hom wɔ atɔrmuadze dɛ apaho no mu migyaa nyimpa baako ma hom: dɛm ntsi
column3: hom pɛ dɛ migyaa Jewfo hen no ma hom anaa?"

column2: "Na hɔn nyina tseaa mu bio dɛ
column3: Nnyɛ oyi a
